akn:content.akn:p: (a) Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary of the Air Force, each officer required under section 20501 of this title to show cause for retention in a space force active status—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Summary of Records Withheld in Interest of National Security.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) When a record is withheld under subsection (a)(4), the officer whose case is under consideration shall, to the extent that the interest of national security permits, be furnished a summary of the record so withheld.
